export default function Safeswap() { return (

Safeswap

Seguro e rápido

Intermediation for Safe Ticket Sales

Buyers and sellers can use a single link to safely exchange tickets. We hold the money until the buyer confirms receipt, ensuring security for both sides.

How it works

  • Seller and buyer connect via a Safeswap link
  • Buyer sends payment to Safeswap (via Pix)
  • Seller sends the ticket
  • Buyer confirms receipt on the website
  • Safeswap releases the payment to the seller

Why Safeswap?

  • No scams – we hold the money securely
  • Fast and reliable transfers
  • Simple process with fewer steps
  • Supports any event ticket
  • Integrated with Pix for instant transactions

Confirm Ticket Receipt

Once you receive the ticket, confirm below so the seller can be paid.

© {new Date().getFullYear()} Safeswap. All rights reserved.
); }
